summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5461 for the improvement of Colorado Avenue, from West Alaska Street to a point 750 feet, more or less, north of the north line thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69358, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
